Package de.mixedfx.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageBus.MessageReceiver  
    ServiceManager.P2PService
    A network dependant service which exists in the same way on all computers!
    ServiceManager.UniqueService
    A service which exists from the start to the end of a network if the service is registered by calling ServiceManager.register(Stoppable)!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection  
    ConnectionInput  
    ConnectionOutput  
    ConnectivityManager  
    MessageBus
    You can send and receive messages over the network (if established, otherwise nothing will happen) in two ways (in the end it's the same way): By using EventBusExtended.publishAsyncSafe(String, Object) (async) / EventBusExtended.publishSyncSafe(String, Object) (sync) with MessageBus.MESSAGE_SEND [methods must be "public"] or writing a method with the Annotation EventTopicSubscriber subscribing for the topic MessageBus.MESSAGE_RECEIVE and call once AnnotationProcessor.process(Object) By using MessageBus.send(RegisteredMessage) (async) or MessageBus.registerForReceival(MessageReceiver)!
    NetworkManager  
    ParticipantManager  
    ServiceManager
    Use ServiceManager.UniqueService or ServiceManager.P2PService!
    TCPCoordinator  
    UDPCoordinator  
    UDPDetected  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectivityManager.Status
